page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.

incidents.name: [GRA][Storage] - Object Storage S3 Incident Notification
incidents.message: Start Time : 16/11/2022 10:11 UTC End Time : 16/11/2022 11:08 UTC Following reverting of the fix implementation, the technical teams have identified the precise cause of the QoS drop. They have already made the necessary software changes to improve the QoS. The incident has therefore been resolved. As part of our policy of continuous improvement, the technical teams will continue to work on the software as well as on the infrastructure to prevent this drop in QoS from recurring.

incidents.name: [DE1][Public Cloud] - Managed Kubernetes Service
incidents.message: Start Time : 30/11/2022 08:30 UTC End Time : 30/11/2022 14:30 UTC Root cause : Some Load Balancers for Managed Kubernetes Service deliveries encountered some disruptions and received ~50% of the total traffic. This situation was due to PCI instances that deploy Load Balancers for Managed Kubernetes Service that were unreachabled, it generated downtime on load balancers. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
